body.p: We wish to investigate if the region in which one lives affects whether or not one has health insurance.
Which would be the explanatory variable?

response.feedback: Incorrect. The explanatory variable "explains" or is used to predict the response. Could having health insurance predict the region in which one lives?
Correct. The explanatory variable is used to predict (explain) the response variable. We are using the region in which one lives to predict the likelihood that one has health insurance.
